elements.text:
You and your partner both have strong opinions and you don't always agree with each other. Over dinner one evening, you get into a heated argument about a topic that is a passion of yours.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: My partner is really smart and thoughtful.
I believe that I'm right, but I choose to accept that we might just disagree on this point.
Even when my partner and I are mad at each other, I know we still care about each other deeply.
This is such an important issue to be discussing.
Our relationship is going to end over this argument.
